---
name: Add Attendance Tracking
about: Implement actual attendance management and tracking for activities
title: "Feature: Attendance Tracking System"
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''
---

## Description
Implement an attendance tracking system to record which students actually attended activities, not just signed up.

## New Features
- Check-in functionality at activity events
- Attendance records per student
- Attendance reports for club organizers
- Attendance certificates or badges
- Attendance statistics

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Admins can mark students as present/absent
- [ ] Attendance records are persistent
- [ ] Attendance reports are generateable
- [ ] Students can view their attendance history
- [ ] Attendance data is accurate
